column2: 31. An emergency vehicle that uses lights and a siren can be unpredictable. Why?
column4: Emergency vehicles must go faster than the posted speed limit when it is safe to do so.
column6: The driver can legally pass red lights.
column8: Emergency vehicle drivers are not required to be careful.

34. Passing on a two-lane, two-way road is not allowed:

column2: 35. The ‘One Way’ sign means that:
column4: there is only one road that turns left at the intersection.
